page.title: 16MY WEEKENDS
page.content: I live just outside Croy on a small farm.There are not very many houses near mine.This is about what I do to pass the time over the weekend.I sleep in until 8.50 then get up for a breakfast of cereal, toast and a cup of tea.My brother and I play a few games, like Monopoly, which is a game that you pay bills , receive money and buy properties.You use toy money.The game helps you to handle money.I go to church at 12.00 and come home for the best meal of the week of pork and potatoes with baked Alaska for pudding .I help my dad feed the cattle then I watch television for an hour.I read books like the Hardyboys and Enid Blyton's books in bed .The Hardyboys are detective stories and are fast moving adventures.The Enid Blyton books are about children who are keen on sleuthing.
